title: Ep. 800 The Entire Plot Exposed
description:
Summary:
In this episode I address the horrifying episode we all witnessed yesterday at the Capitol Hill Kavanaugh hearings. I also break down the entire anti-Trump scheme, how it worked, and a new piece of information that should trouble every American. 
 
News Picks:
Jeff Carlson’s piece addresses the deeply troubling revelation that Nellie Ohr was working for Fusion GPS as far back as 2015. 
 
This older piece by Jeff Carlson lays bare the timeline of FISA process abuses.
 
Who is Stefan Halper and why does it matter to you?  
 
Is Bob Mueller planning an October surprise? 
 
Three takeaways from yesterday’s Kavanaugh hearing.
 
Just when you think liberals have reached peak stupid, they prove you wrong. 
 
No, the “okay” symbol isn’t a white power symbol. 
 
Why is Levi’s jeans supporting gun control? 
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.

Summary: In this episode I address the horrifying episode we all witnessed yesterday at the Capitol Hill Kavanaugh hearings. I also break down the entire anti-Trump scheme, how it worked, and a new piece of information that should trouble every American.    News Picks: Jeff Carlson’s piece addresses the deeply troubling revelation that Nellie Ohr was working for Fusion GPS as far back as 2015.    This older piece by Jeff Carlson lays bare the timeline of FISA process abuses.   Who is Stefan Halper and why does it matter to you?     Is Bob Mueller planning an October surprise?    Three takeaways from yesterday’s Kavanaugh hearing.   Just when you think liberals have reached peak stupid, they prove you wrong.    No, the “okay” symbol isn’t a white power symbol.    Why is Levi’s jeans supporting gun control?    Copyright CRTV.
